casebody.data:
ZLOOP, INC.
v.
PARKER POE ADAMS & BERNSTEIN LLP, et al. 122PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2018 Gavin J. Reardon, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Amiel J. Rossabi, Bonnie Keith Green, Attorneys at Law, for Zloop, INC. Robert W. Fuller, Stuart L. Pratt, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of December 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2018."
